tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EsportsCommunicationLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TeamCommunicationLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    log_text TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ChatHistories (
    chat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    chat_text TEXT,
    chat_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE team (team_id INT PRIMARY KEY, team_name TEXT, team_region TEXT) 

CREATE TABLE player (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name TEXT, player_age INT, player_role TEXT) 

CREATE TABLE chat_message (message_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_id INT, receiver_id INT, message_text TEXT, message_time TIMESTAMP) 

CREATE TABLE chat_room (room_id INT PRIMARY KEY, room_name TEXT) 

CREATE TABLE tournament_result (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, tournament_id INT, team_id INT, result ENUM('win', 'loss', 'tie'))
